154b2: sam/ de ci'i slang du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gzugs so// 'di ni tshor ba'o// 'di ni 'du shes so// 'di ni 'du byed rnams so// 'don rnam par shes pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
154b3: nyid kyi bar du yin no/ / snyam du gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i pha rol dang / 'du shes kyi pha rol dang / 'du byed rnams kyi pha rol dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa
154b4: ciyang ma mchis/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid
154b5: kyi phyir/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu dka' ba byed pa yin te/ chos 'di dag 'di ltar zhi ba 'di ltar zab pa la nges par sems kyang zhum par mi
154b6: 'gyur te/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ste/ de ltar bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ltar
154b7: zab pa'i chos 'di dag sems can rnams la bstan par bya'o snyam du sems pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na
154b8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi gling yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chu klung dag gam/ mtsho'am/ mtsho chen po dag ga ma rgya mtsho dag gis phyogs 'di dang chus kun du

155a1: bab/ chod pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni ming zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de kho na bzhin
155a2: dra mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de/ byang chu
155a3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon gyi mtha'
155a4: dang khyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de yon bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par yong du rgyad napa/ sems can rnams la chos ston to/ rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang /
155a5: phyi ma'i mtha'i chos yongs su chad pa 'dis chos thams cad yongs su chad pa yin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi bgya nom pa ji lta ba bzhin yid
155a6: 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / lam yongs su chad pa dang / srid pa zad pa dang / lhag ma ma lus pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ste/ rab 'byor
155a7: de lta na byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi thang yin no/ / rab 'byor jim na byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga'ajig rten rnams kyi ston ma mdzin pa dang / 'od byed pa yin non/
155a8: bcom ldan 'das dag gis de dag gi don de kho na la de kho nar rtogs nas/ de yon bzhin du 'dzin cing/ sams can rnams la yang ston la/ sems can rnams kyang de yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud la rab tu 'go

155b1: par byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'ji rte rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa dang / 'od byed pa yin no// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten
155b2: rnams kyi ded dpon dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag sems can la mngon par zhugs pa 'gro bangan pa'i 'gro ba 'gro ba dag la/ sems can rnams rnam par dag
155b3: bar bya ba dang / mya ngan dang / gnod pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bdag nub par bya ba dang / rigs pa chos rtogs par bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir/ bgrod
155b4: pagacig pa'i lam ston par byed do/ / de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
155b5: dang / rnam par byang ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang //
155b6: rnam par byang pa med par sems can rnams la chos ston to// de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyi mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang /
155b7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
155b8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi ded dpon dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin no// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin zhe na/ rab

156a1: 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pas
156a2: sems can rnams bsdus nas/ sems can de dag nyid la gzugs nam mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nam mkha'i tshul can du chos ston
156a3: de lta god ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dun ma mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to// gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni stong pa nyid de// de ni gang nas kyang 'ad ba med la/ gang du yang 'gru
156a4: med par sems can rnams la chos ston to/ / de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni stong pa nyid de// de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la/ gang du yang 'gro ba
156a5: med par sems can rnams la chos ston to/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar na ston pa nyid de/ de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba mdal/ gang du yang 'gro ba med par sems can
156a6: rnams la chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin no// de ci'i phyir zhun/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
156a7: med pa'i tshul can te/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag lan
156a8: 'groba'am/ 'o ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byong chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul da las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor

156b1: skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byung ba med pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'od bci yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang /
156b2: 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /
156b3: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byung ba med pa dag la ni 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sbrum dang / sgeg s+thu dang / chu zla dang / rmi la ma dang / mig yod dang / khrag cha dang / sbrul
156b4: pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor zlu ma dang / smig sgra dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / sprul ba dag la ni 'gro
156b5: 'am/ 'od bci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dazi ba med pa dang / bstan pa med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'di'o// de ci'i phyir na
156b6: ra 'byor dbri ba med pa dang / bstan med pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ rab byor chos thams cad nam 'ongs pa'i tshul can te/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ca pani
156b7: dag kyang tshul dalas pa 'da'o/ / daci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i byar ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni thang du med pa dang / dang rje
156b8: med pa'i mang kyi tshul da pa chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chan po de dag kyang tshul dalas mi 'da'o/ / cang phyir zhen/ rab 'byor blang du med pa dang / dor du med pa la ni 'tha ba 'ag/ 'od ba ci yang mid migs pa gyur ba//

157a1: kyo thams cad ni bad pa'i tham can// nubyam pas dpa' sams dbyung na bdu gang tshum rnams pa 'ad/ c-i kyi na// khyong sa med pal 'dzu /
157a2: cigs sa da pa'i phyir du/ tsas ma cad ni bdag sa pa'i dul te/ byang chubs babad 'as pa sad pa dzin po da med dumarnams sasu/ 'i phying na/ rab khyong dag la'i gro ba ma/
157a3: mid dmigs pa'i gyur / ba 'byong gas gas na du tshus thams cad nimapa can med pa dang ba pa ma du pa dang / kho ya pa dang / gas pa med pa dang ga cag med pa dang / gdas
157a4: med pa dang / shed bri med pa dang / stong ba bo med pa dang / kun nas slong ba ba med pa dang / byed pa po med pa dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
157a5: dedag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag gtan mad cing dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du sems can dang / srog dang / gsob dang / gang zag dang / shed la siskyes pa dang / she dbu dang / slong bapo dang /
157a6: kun nas slong ba po dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / badzad pa po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// ba 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'i tshul canan// rab 'byor na shin
157a7: sa thams cadan pa pa'i tshul can dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshul can dang / dag gi rdul can dang / bdag med pa'i tshum can dang / snang ba'i tshul can dang / mi snang pa'i tshul can dang / mtshan pa'i tshul can dang / can ma mo
157a8: pa'i rdus can dang / smon pa'i chu dang / na pamen pa'i chul can dang / 'i tshum can dang / pa'i tshul can dag kun sa nyon mongs pa'i tshul can dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i rdul can dang / rgya nga'i tshul can dang /

157b1: skye ba med pa'i tshul can dang / 'gag pa'i tshul can dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul can dang / dngos po'i tshul can dang / dngos po med pa'i tshul can dang / sdug pa'i tshul can dang / mi sdug pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las mi
157b2: 'da'o/ / de ci'i byar zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / sdug pa'i bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
157b3: 'dod chags kyi gzhi can dang / zhe sdang gi gzhi can dang / gti mug gi gzhi can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi gzhi dang / zhe sdang gi gzhi dang / gti mug gi gzhi gtan med cing mi dmigs na/
157b4: de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong brtag la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i gzhi can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lta ba'i rnam pa'i gzhi dang / med cing mi dmigs na de dag gi 'gros
157b5: 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshul can dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul can dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshul can dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul can dang / bsam gyis mi khyab
157b6: pa'i dbyings kyi tshul can te tshul de las mi 'da'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gtan med cing mi dmigs na/
157b7: de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba stag pa yod pa'i phyir ro// ba 'byor chos thams cad ni g.yo ba med pa'i tshul can te/ rul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gang 'gro ba 'am 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i g.yo ba nyid gang yang
157b8: med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi tshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshor ba'i tshul can dang / 'du shes kyi tshul can dang / 'du byed kyi tshul can dang / rnam par shes pa'i

158a1: tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs med cing mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs ma/
158a2: dag gi 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de'i sbyin
158a3: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi tshul can dang / bzod pa'i tshul can dang / brtson 'grus kyi tshul can dang / bsam gtan gyi tshul can dang / shes rab kyi tshul can te/
158a4: tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
158a5: pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nang stong pa zhi kyi
158a6: tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'dra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad
158a7: ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshul can dang / de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul canate/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni gtan med cing mi dmigs
158a8: na de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong bltag la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i tshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya ni/

158b1: bar gyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos
158b2: thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshul can no/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar gyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs
158b3: rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i tshul can no// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos
158b4: thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gtan med
158b5: cing mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid med cing mi da migs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la/
158b6: yod pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
158b7: byang chub gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
158b8: bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab mo 'di la su dag mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

159a1: chen po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa spyad pa dag dang / sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed
159a2: pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
159a3: chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid de ci 'dra ba zhig du 'gyur lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi rtags/
159a4: ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ mtshan ma ni ci 'dra ba zhig/ dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
159a5: la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dul ba yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
159a6: pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rtags dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kyi dben pa dag tu 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
159a7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ji lta bu'i tshul can du 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
159a8: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du

159b1: 'gyur ro/ / gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa sgom pa dag ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
159b2: tshul can du 'gyur lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa lags la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa
159b3: yang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di lags so// bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad gang dag rnam par 'jig pa yin/ gsol pa/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
159b4: rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug dang / khams bcwa brgyad rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di
159b5: lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bdag dang / sems can dang / skye ba po dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba
159b6: bodod kun pa slong yo dang cho po dang / tsho bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
159b7: khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa lags
159b8: so/ / de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes

160a1: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam rnams rnam
160a2: 'jig pa lags so/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'dis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
160a3: tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par 'jig pa lags so// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab
160a4: kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par 'jig pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes/
160a5: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs rnam par 'jig pa'o// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig
160a6: pa yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ mig rnam par 'jig pa yin no// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnam
160a7: par 'jig pa yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ gzugs rnams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg
160a8: bya dang / / chos rnams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ mig gi khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa

160b1: ni/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam/
160b2: par 'jig pa yin no// 'di sa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
160b3: phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ las kyi khams dang / reg bya'o
160b4: khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
160b5: khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par 'jig pa yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
160b6: phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du rnam par 'jig pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par
160b7: 'jig pa yin no/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa yin no// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
160b8: pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams na shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'jig pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'did/ ces bka' stsal to// rab

161a1: 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
161a2: du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas nye bar brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
161a3: sems dpa' chen po la la ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
161a4: rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed do//
161a5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/ gzhan gyis smras pa'i tshig dag la snying po med pa dang / de kho na ma yin par khong du chud par byed de/ gzhan
161a6: gyi dad pas mi 'gro'o/ / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyu ro// byang chub sems dpa'/
161a7: sems dpa' chen po la la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi byung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
161a8: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/

161b1: spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid thos nas/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ mi zhum mi 'gong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yid phyir ldeg par ma
161b2: 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo nyan par mngon par dga' zhing / thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ kun chub par byed pa nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa dang / de bzhin du
161b3: bsgrub par byed pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
161b4: byin pa zab mo 'di thos shing yongs su dri ba byas pa dang / bzung ba dang / kun chub par byas pa nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
161b5: dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba na/ mi skrag me dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ mi zhum mi 'gong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las de'i yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur
161b6: ba'i steng du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ kun chub par byed pa nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa
161b7: rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba na/ mi skrag mi dang shing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ mi zhum me 'gong ste/
161b8: blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang med byer ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma 'di 'don par bgyid panag/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du brtso

162a1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ji ltar spyad par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol
162a2: ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bya'o/ / gsol pa/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ stong pa nyid la
162a3: gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bya'o// de bzhin du nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/
162a4: ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / de bzhin du de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / de bzhin du de bzhin
162a5: nyid la gzhol ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba dang / chos mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud
162a6: da / de bzhin du sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig g.yor dang / zag cha dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal
162a7: pabapadang / bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
162a8: la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sgyu ma dang / smig d+hA dang / d+ha r+tha dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / zag cha dang / sprul pa la gzhol ni sems kyi

162b1: rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gzugs la spyod pa lags sam/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
162b2: rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod pa lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
162b3: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni/ gzugs la spyod pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod pa ma yin no// rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang
162b4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa ma yin no// rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ni sus kyang ma
162b5: byas/ 'gyur bar yang ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs gang du yang ma song / gang la yang mi gnas/ yul na yang mi gnas/ phyogs na yang mi gnas te/ de la ni grangs dang / rtsis kyang mi gnas mi dmigs so//
162b6: gang la grangs dang / rtsis mi dmigs pa de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs sa mtshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ sbyin pa 'am/ rlus
162b7: khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan dag gam/ shes rab 'am/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar mi nus so//
162b8: deci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa de ba ni tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin

163a1: ba'i phyir/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/ de bzhin du tshor
163a2: ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/ de bzhin du sbyang te/
163a3: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams
163a4: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi
163a5: pha rol du phyin pa khri ba las bsgom pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ / nyi shu gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dag gis lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang /
163a6: rgya spos dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dag dang / lha'i ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste//
163a7: lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom
163a8: ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni rtogs par dka' ba/ brtag par mi nus pa/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags pa/ zhi bzhipa mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang / shes pas rig par bgyi ba lags pa

163b1: dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa lags te/ 'di ltar gzugs nyid rnamapa
163b2: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
163b3: nyid do/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa ste/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
163b4: byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyisu ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so//
163b5: 'di ltar mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig lags so// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa tham/
163b6: cad mkhyen pa nyid yid lags te/ mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma
163b7: mchis so/ / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchi
163b8: shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/ / 'di ltar gzugs rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs rnams lagaso// de bzhin du sgra dang / dr-i dang / ro dang / reg bya dang /

164a1: chos rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chos rnams lags so// 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
164a2: bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so// de bzhin du mig gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad
164a3: mkhyen pa nyid mig kyi khams lags te/ mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis
164a4: su dbyer ma mchis so/ / 'di ltar gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang /
164a5: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi kham+ba
164a6: dade/ chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams lags te/ de ltar na yid
164a7: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer/
164a8: ma mchis so// de bzhin du 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams lag so// de bzhin du yang dag/

164b1: pa'i spong ba gang lags pa dag dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam/
164b2: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad/
164b3: mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang dag lags pa nyid rnam pa thams
164b4: cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang lags pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar gyi de
164b5: bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyi su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so// de skad ces gsol
164b6: pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams
164b7: cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs yin no/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams
164b8: cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa yin te/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyi su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//

165a1: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra byed rnams dang / rnam par gas pa'ang banan nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mabyen pa ta dang gnyenag can mig nan na nyid de/ gnyis su med cing gnyis
165a2: su byed med do/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su
165a3: med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ / lha dag don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ni thugs kyi phrin las chu dpal gzhol bar mdzad kyi chos ston pa la ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
165a4: dag kyang chos 'di ni zab ste// mthong bar dka' ba rtogs par dka' ba/ brtag par mi nus pa/ zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang / 'dzangs pas rig par bya ba yin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgyas
165a5: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa de ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa yin te/ de ni sras kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas// gang las kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas// gang du yang mngon par
165a6: rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/ lha dga' di ni gang la gnyis kun du rgyu ba yang med pa'i chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro// lha dag nam mkha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha dag de bzhin du de bzhin nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir
165a7: dang / chos kyi dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mtha' yas shing mthar thug pa med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'grob
165a8: med pa pa nyid kyi phyir dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / can nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha dag de bzhin du bdag zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa po dang /

165b1: mthong ba po'i bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha dag de bzhin du gzugs zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir
165b2: chos 'di zab po/ / lha dag de bzhin du mig zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po// lha dag de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po// lha dag gzugs rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di
165b3: zab bo lha dag de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po// lha dag de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di
165b4: zab po/ rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha dag de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos
165b5: 'di zab po/ / lha dag de bzhin du lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha dag lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi
165b6: phyir chos 'di zab po/ / lha dag yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po// lha dag de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / tshul
165b7: khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//
165b8: lha dag de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa/

166a1: nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi
166a2: dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha dag de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zab pa nyid kyi
166a3: byir dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po/ lha dag de bzhin
166a4: gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po/ / lha dag de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
166a5: zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab po/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos
166a6: 'di bstan to/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba 'am/ mi bzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes/
166a7: pa gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du mi gzung ba 'am/ mi nga ba kyi 'i spad du rtan pa ma gas / da ni du dang / ga dang / dang / yus dang med zung rag mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags
166a8: gzugs rnams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags//

166b1: de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du snga'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes
166b2: pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags
166b3: lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
166b4: khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol du byin pa gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
166b5: bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin
166b6: du nang stong pa nyid gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
166b7: rgyas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang ba ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang /
166b8: gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi 'i nga bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag

167a1: ba rnams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags// yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
167a2: brgyad pa gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi
167a3: chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar
167a4: bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad/
167a5: du bstan pa'i ma lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gzugs so// de bzhin du bdag tshor ba'o// bdag 'du shes so// bdag 'du byed rnams so// dag gi 'du byed rnams so/ bdag rnam par shes pa'o// de bzhin du dag mig/
167a6: go// bdag gi mig go// bdag rna ba'o// bdag gi rna ba'o// sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin no// de bzhin du dag gi ni gzugs rnams so// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyang de bzhin no// bdag cag chos rnams so/
167a7: bdag cag gi chos rnams so// mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin no// de bzhin du bdag rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i
167a8: khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus

167b1: kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bdag gi yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// de bzhin du bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gi
167b2: sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ / de bzhin du bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdag gi
167b3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / de bzhin du bdag gi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
167b4: byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong/
167b5: pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// de bzhin du bdag cag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bdag cag gi dran pa
167b6: nyebar gzhag pa rnams so/ / de bzhin du bdag cag yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bdag cag 'phags
167b7: pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ / de bzhin du bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag go// de bzhin du bdag rgyan tu
167b8: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ / bdag gi rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang // dgra bcom pa'i bar dag go// bdag rang byang chub po// bdag rnam pa

168a1: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ / bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de zhes bdag du 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa la spyod pa lags so// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/
168a2: bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha dgad de bzhin te/ lha dag de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ lha dag chos 'di
168a3: ni gzugs gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du mig
168a4: gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ gzugs rnams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung
168a5: bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang /
168a6: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir
168a7: bstan pa ma yin/ sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
168a8: gzung ba 'am mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ yid kyi khams dang /

168b1: chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin
168b2: pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzung ba 'am mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
168b3: dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa
168b4: stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa
168b5: ma yin/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
168b6: rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar
168b7: bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma ya ni zhing / lha dag chos 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba
168b8: 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ de bzhin

169a1: du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba 'am/ mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ lha dag gang zag gang dag gzugs gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du
169a2: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so// de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
169a3: pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so// /
169a4: de bzhin du mig gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du gzugs rnams dang / sgra rnams dang / dri rnams
169a5: dang / ro rnams dang / reg bya rnams dang / chos rnams gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya/
169a6: ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang
169a7: ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang // yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
169a8: gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /

169b1: bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gzung ba 'am/ srung bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du nang sang ba nyid dang / bya stong pa dang / rmyi nang stong pa nyid dang / spyod pa nyid
169b2: stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
169b3: bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /
169b4: de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
169b5: dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang //
169b6: de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adas pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba 'am/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom par mi nus/ de bzhin du yang dag
169b7: pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom par mi nus la/ de dag gis ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par
169b8: mi nus/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du bsgom par mi rus/ de dag gis ni rnam pa thams

170a1: cad mkhyen pa pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang
170a2: 'thun pa lags so/ / ji ltar na chos 'di chos thams cad dang 'thun pa lags she na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
170a3: dang 'thun pa lags so/ / de bzhin du chos 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
170a4: pa dang 'thun pa lags so/ / chos 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'thun pa nas/ chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'thun pa lags/
170a5: so// chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang 'thun pa nas/ chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang 'thun pa lags so// de bzhin du chos 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang 'thun
170a6: pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dang 'thun pa lags so// de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so// de bzhin du chos 'di ni lan
170a7: cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so/ / chos 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang 'thun pa lags so// chos 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras
170a8: bu dang 'thun pa lags so/ / chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'thun pa lags te/ chos 'di ni gang du yang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so// ji ltar na thogs pa ma mchis pa lags she na/

170b1: 'di lta ste/ gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ btsun pa bcom
170b2: ldan 'das nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang / de bzhin du chos gnas pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi slad du dang // de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi srad du dang / mtshan
170b3: ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nus nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
170b4: kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid lags so/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid kyi skad du dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /
170b5: rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du chos 'di skye ba ma mchis pa lags so// btsun pa
170b6: bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/
170b7: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan
170b8: 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnas

171a1: brtan rab 'byor ni gang ci ston pa de thams cad song ba nyid dang ldan pa dang / stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'bral bar ston pa'i slang du'o// danas cha dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis ya dgal 'dis nas smras so//
171a2: lha dag gang 'di skad du nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so// zhes zer ba la/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gang gi rjes su bskyes pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa
171a3: yin/ ci re shig gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no// de bzhin nyid de ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song la/ de bzhin du gnas
171a4: brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ / gang du yang ma song ste/ de lta na ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams
171a5: cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de yin zhing / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid med pa yin te//
171a6: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de yin te/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab
171a7: 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no/ / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang la yang thogs pa med de/ de bzhin
171a8: gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de gnyis su med cing dbyer med do// de bzhin nyid de ni ma byas pa ste/ de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma

171b1: yin pa ma yin no/ / gang gi phyir de rtag du de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i phyir de gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no// ji ltar de bzhin
171b2: gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi dad cing bye brag med la/ gnyis su med pa de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bskyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos
171b3: thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na med la/ de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin te/ de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir rjes su skyes pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
171b4: yin pa de ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin da ltar byung ba ma yin la/ de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de ltar na gnas
171b5: brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o/ / 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid yin no// ma
171b6: 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin no// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
171b7: nyid yin la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid yin te/ de ltar na 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin
171b8: nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ / de bzhin du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin

172a1: nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis pa dbyer med do// de bzhin du bdag gi de bzhin nyid nas/ shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid
172a2: dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / shes rab
172a3: kyi pha rol du byin pa'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs// /
172a4: pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du dran pa nye
172a5: bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bci de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su
172a6: med cing gnyis pu dbyer med do/ / de bzhin du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang /
172a7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ lha dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de bzhin nyid gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
172a8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i mtshan thob pa'i chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni 'di yin no// de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i

172b1: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug du 'gyul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'phrul lo// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg go// g.yos rab tu g.yos// kun du rab tu g.yos so// shang phyogs/
172b2: mngon// nub phyogs dma'o// rlub phyogs than shar phyogs da ma'o// byang phyogs mthon/ lho phyogs dma'o// lho phyogs mngon/ byang phyogs dma'o// mtha' thon// dab ba dpa'o// dbus dam na/ mtha' mthar/
172b3: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang / lha'i rgyu spos dang / shing tam la'i lo ma'i bye ma dag dang / lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / kra mu ta dang
172b4: pad ma dkar po dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor/ mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor/ tshig 'di skad ces gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
172b5: bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ / zhes smras so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas gzung ste/ lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha dag/
172b6: de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par
172b7: shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa sa gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
172b8: nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin

173a1: nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ / 'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes// 'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid
173a2: las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dag 'di ltar gang zhig rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang las skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshes de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs
173a3: pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos
173a4: skyon med pa nyid 'di ni zab lags ste/ de la ni gzugs dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid mi dmigs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad
173a5: smos pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid 'di ni zab ste/ de la ni gzugs dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so// de la ni
173a6: tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
173a7: panyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin nyid la ni shig gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs ni/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ltag la dmigs de bzhin du re shig tshor ba dang / de bzhin du
173a8: 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyidade lta ga la dmigs/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ re shig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang mi dmigs ni//

173b1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta ga la dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin nyid 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong khra nyas stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga
173b2: brgyan chos rnams la chos kyi mige rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ / lha dang mi lnga stong gas ni ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po drug bcu ni len pa med par zag
173b3: pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lo 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis
173b4: ni sangs rgyas lnga brgya la bsnyen bkur byas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la dbul ba dag phul te/ de dag las rab tu byung nas/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bskyed/ brtson
173b5: 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan dag pa sbubs mod kyi/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing / thabs la mkhas pa
173b6: dang bral ba'i phyir/ 'du shes sna tshogs pa nyid dang / spyod pa tha dad pa nyid du gyur te/ de dag ni 'di lta ste/ 'di ni sbyin pa'o// de bzhin du sbyin bdag dang / 'di ni slong ba'o// 'di ltar sbyin par bya'o// 'di la ni sbyin
173b7: par bya'o/ / de bzhin du 'di ni tshul khrims so// bdag cig ni 'di ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// tshul khrims no 'di ltar bsrung bar bya'o// de bzhin du 'di ni bzod pa'o// bdag cag ni 'di ltar bzod pa dang ldan pa'o//
173b8: 'di ltar bzod pa 'di bskyed par bya'o// de bzhin du 'di ni brtson 'grus so// bdag cag ni 'di ltar brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o// 'di ltar brtson 'grus 'di btsam par bya'o// de bzhin du 'di dag ni bsam gtan no// bdag cag na

174a1: 'di ltar bsam gtan pa'o/ / 'di ltar bsam gtan 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du de lta bu'i 'du shes can dag tu gyur to// de dag gis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang thabs
174a2: la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin par sbyin pa dag byin/ tshul khrims dag bsrungs/ bzod pa dag bskyed/ brtson 'grus dag brtsams/ bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag gis ni 'du shes tha dad pa nyid med pa gang gis byang chub
174a3: sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes tha dad pa nyid med pa ma thob pas/ / de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ma zhugs kyi/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob pa nas/ de bzhin du dgra
174a4: bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de yang yod/ mtshan ma med pa yang yod/ rnam par
174a5: thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa yang yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur
174a6: ro/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dag stong pa nyid dang /
174a7: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bral te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas/ nyan thos sam
174a8: rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom du bas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin cing / thabs

174b1: mkhas pa la brtan te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum bgyis nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lags/ 'di skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
174b2: kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la gang zag kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su ma
174b3: zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag sgom na/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
174b4: dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas legs par zin pa dang / thabs la mkham pa la brten te/ snying rje chen po mngon sum du byas nas/ stong pa nyid dang
174b5: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams sgoms na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
174b6: dper na sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang nal dab chags bya dab ma med la lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig yod par gyur la/ de yang de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ong bar sems te/ 'dzam
174b7: bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o snyam nas/ des bdag nyid mchongs la/ bdag nyid 'tshengs pa'i 'og tu bar skabs na/ de 'di snyam du de ni bdag 'dzam bu'i gling du ma lhung bar sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du
174b8: gnas par bya'o/ / snyam du sems na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci bya 'dab ma med pa des slar bdag nyid sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du gzhag par nus snyam 'am/ gsol pa

175a1: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang gal te bya 'dab ma med pa de/ de nas lhung bzhin du 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma mal bdag ma smas ma snang bar
175a2: 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o snyam nA/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di di snyam du sems/ ci bya 'dab ma med pa de ma spras ma snang bar 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par 'gyur snyam 'am/ gsol ba btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags te/
175a3: de ni smras pa dang / snad pa kho nar 'dzam bu'i gling du lhung zhing 'gum pa 'am/ 'gum pa la thug pa'i sdug bsngal can du 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byed gang yang rung ba zhig lus che zhing 'dab
175a4: ma mchis par gyur la/ mthon po zhog nas lhung ba de ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i
175a5: theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis bskal pa mang po zhig tu sbyin pa byin zhing / de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrung / bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan dag bsgrubs shes rab bsgoms su zin kyang /
175a6: de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang bral zhing / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am
175a7: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bas/ chos de dag bskal pa mang po zhig tu bsgoms
175a8: shing sbyin pa byin/ de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus brtsams// bsam gtan dag bsgrubs/ shes rab bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su

175b1: ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas/ de'i phyir de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de 'das pa dang / ma byon pa
175b2: dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang / tshul khrims dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de dag sems shing mtshan par
175b3: 'dzin la kun du 'dzin te/ sgom mod kyi/ 'on kyang des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phyogs tsam yang mi shes so// de bzhin du des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol
175b4: ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phyogs tsam yang mi shes la/ de yang mi shes mi mthong bzhin du byang chub kyi lam stong pa nyid de dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos de dag gi sgra nyan par byed do// des sgra de yid
175b5: la byas nas/ mtshan mar 'dzin to// mtshan mar gzung nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed de/ de ltar yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
175b6: gang zag de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bral
175b7: bde ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskrad phyin chad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pa dang / ma bral bar
175b8: smin pa smin par byed/ tshul khrims srung / bzod pa skyed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral bas 'das

176a1: pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa de mtshan mar mi 'dzin
176a2: la/ de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtshan mar mi 'dzin te/ de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin par rig par
176a3: bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ sems dang po bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung / tshul khrims bsrungs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bzod pa bskyed kyang
176a4: mtshan mar ma bzung / brtson 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung la/ 'das pa dang / ma byon
176a5: pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshan mar ma bzung ba'i phyir te/ shA
176a6: dati'i bu gang mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong / tshul khrims srung / bzod pa bskyed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan dgal stobs par 'jug pa nas/ rnam pa thams cad
176a7: mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams la mkhas pa yin no// gsol pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/
